document.full_text: british spirits giant diageo  is to split up its international region into africa and latin america in a policy to focus more resources on fast growing emerging markets and away from some mature markets.
document.title: diageo to split region to focus on growth
lines_and_colors: british spirits giant diageo  is to split up its international region into africa and latin america in a policy to focus more resources on fast growing emerging markets and away from some mature markets.
